parameters.name: CurveArray
parameters.description: Array of b-spline curves

parameters.name: BBlendClosed
parameters.description: True if blend closed, false if not

parameters.name: BForceCubic
parameters.description: True if force surface is cubic, false if not

parameters.name: GuideCrvArray
parameters.description: Array of guide curves

parameters.name: StartMatchingType
parameters.description: Start matching type: 0 = MATCH_NONE (default) 1 = MATCH_NORMAL 2 = MATCH_VECTOR 3 = MATCH_ALL_FACES or MATCH_FACE_G1 4 = MATCH_FACE_G2

parameters.name: EndMatchingType
parameters.description: End matching type: 0 = MATCH_NONE (default) 1 = MATCH_NORMAL 2 = MATCH_VECTOR 3 = MATCH_ALL_FACES or MATCH_FACE_G1 4 = MATCH_FACE_G2

parameters.name: NormalAtStartSection
parameters.description: Normal at start section when StartMatchingType is MATCH_NORMAL or MATCH_VECTOR; otherwise, can be Nothing

parameters.name: NormalAtEndSection
parameters.description: Normal at start section when EndMatchingType is MATCH_NORMAL or MATCH_VECTOR; otherwise, can be Nothing

parameters.name: StartMatchingFaceList
parameters.description: Array of matching faces at start section when startMatchingType is MATCH_ALL_FACES, MATCH_FACE_G1, or MATCH_FACE_G2; otherwise, can be Nothing

parameters.name: EndMatchingFaceList
parameters.description: Array of matching faces at end section when startMatchingType is MATCH_ALL_FACES, MATCH_FACE_G1, or MATCH_FACE_G2; otherwise, can be Nothing

parameters.name: DegeneratedStart
parameters.description: True to degenerate at start, false to not

parameters.name: DegeneratedEnd
parameters.description: True to degenerate at end, false to not

parameters.name: StartPointOfStartSection
parameters.description: Start point of start section

parameters.name: StartPointOfEndSection
parameters.description: Start point of end section

parameters.name: SectionIndexStart
parameters.description: Index of start section; default is -1

parameters.name: SectionIndexEnd
parameters.description: Index of end section; default is -1

parameters.name: GuideIndexStart
parameters.description: Index of start guide curve; default is -1

parameters.name: GuideIndexEnd
parameters.description: Index of end guide curve; default is -1
